message.content:
cs.CR, cs.OS, cs.SE, cs.SY, cs.AR 

The paper discusses remote attestation, which is a security topic, and specifically focuses on the design of a hybrid RA system that uses a formally verified microkernel. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) sub-category. Additionally, the paper mentions the use of software components and microkernels, which are related to operating systems (cs.OS) and software engineering (cs.SE). The paper also discusses the use of RA in embedded and cyber-physical systems, which suggests that it may also belong to the cs.SY (Systems and Control) sub-category. Finally, the paper mentions the use of RA as a building block for other security services and primitives, which suggests that it may also belong to the cs.AR (Hardware Architecture) sub-category.
